content: I'll definitely start with a thorough wash and clay bar to remove any contaminants on the paint. I've heard that using a dual-action polisher can be a bit tricky, so I might need to practice on a small area first. By the way, do you know if there are any specific detailing techniques or products that can help remove stubborn stains or tar on the paint? I've got a few spots on the hood that I've been trying to get rid of for a while now.
